pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.1.16: A formal meeting of the community”, saṁvāsa, is defined at bhikkhu-pācittiya 69, Bu Pc 69:2.1.21, as the observance day ceremony, the invitation ceremony, or a legal procedure.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.3.5: That osāreti must mean “recite” can be seen from bhikkhu-pācittiya 4 where there is no offense if osārentaṁ opāteti, “he prompts one who is osārentaṁ.” The difference between uddesaṃ deti and osāreti is not clear to me.
